Style/TrailingCommaInHashLiteral.description:
Description

Checks for trailing comma in hash literals.
Style/TrailingCommaInHashLiteral.option:
This rule supports the following parameters in your configuration:

EnforcedStyleForMultiline: no_comma (type: str)
SupportedStylesForMultiline: ['comma', 'consistent_comma', 'diff_comma', 'no_comma'] (type: list)
